item.title: ScanBarcode-QRcode
item.description:
Scan Barcode & QR code is a simple and fast code scanner with all the features a modern android app.
I completed the Udacity andriod course and decided to make my own app.
Reasons to make the Scanner app : The idea did not looked complex for a beginner to implement. I already knew a barcode scanner library which was pretty popular. All the similar apps on playstore had AD’S and I wanted a AD free version.
